verses.verse: Now these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, which were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H550>Amnon<s%>, of <S%H293>Ahinoam<s%> the <S%H3159>Jezreelitess<s%>; the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, of <S%H26>Abigail<s%> the <S%H3762>Carmelitess<s%>:

The <S%H7992>third<s%>, <S%H53>Absalom<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maachah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8526>Talmai<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1650>Geshur<s%>: the <S%H7243>fourth<s%>, <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%>:

These <S%H8337>six<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; and there he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>: and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And these were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%H8092>Shimea<s%>, and <S%H7727>Shobab<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%>, of <S%H1340>Bath-shua<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%>:
These were all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, beside the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6370>concubines<s%>, and <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> were, the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%>, the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%>, the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>, the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6305>Pedaiah<s%> were, <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>, and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>; <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, and <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, and <S%H8019>Shelomith<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>:

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>; <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%>, and <S%H3470>Jesaiah<s%>: the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H770>Arnan<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7935>Shechaniah<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7935>Shechaniah<s%>; <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>; <S%H2407>Hattush<s%>, and <S%H3008>Igeal<s%>, and <S%H1282>Bariah<s%>, and <S%H5294>Neariah<s%>, and <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H454>Elioenai<s%> were, <S%H1939>Hodaiah<s%>, and <S%H475>Eliashib<s%>, and <S%H6411>Pelaiah<s%>, and <S%H6126>Akkub<s%>, and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%>, and <S%H1806>Dalaiah<s%>, and <S%H6054>Anani<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%>.
